compliance_assessment.framework_description: General Data Protection Regulation - A regulation in EU law on data protection and privacy.

requirements.requirement: Obtain explicit consent from users for data processing.
recommendations: Implement a consent management system to obtain and manage user consent.

requirements.requirement: Ensure data minimization and purpose limitation.
requirements.evidence: Data collected may exceed necessary information.
recommendations: Define and document data retention policies to ensure data minimization.

requirements.requirement: Implement data protection by design and by default.
requirements.evidence: Some security controls are planned but not implemented.
gaps: Lack of comprehensive data protection measures.
recommendations: Integrate data protection measures into the application development lifecycle.

critical_gaps: No explicit consent mechanism for data processing.
Insufficient data retention and minimization policies.
remediation_plan: Develop and implement a consent management system.
Integrate data protection measures into the development process.
